['The story of Amalek is one of the most remarkable accounts in all the Bible , and is in many ways unique to our own experience .', "Indeed , God Almighty 's decree for the utter annihilation of the whole Amalekite nation has historically been more than many commentators could swallow .", "Dr. Robert Jamieson : `` The doom of extermination denounced against the Amalekites has been a great difficulty in the way of establishing the historical truth of this book ; Rationalistic and infidel writers declaring it to be irreconcilable with the benevolence of the Divine character and government .
